name: .M21 File Extension
summary: Learn about .M21 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Media file created with the AXMEDIS Editor; saved in a packaged content distribution format and may contain multiple types of media; may also include descriptive metadata, and DRM copy-protection information.

content: AXMEDIS MPEG-21 files may also be saved with an .MP21 file extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
